mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`ACTION`, (case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end) AS `ACTIONMANNER`, t1.`ACTIONSN`, t1.`ACTOR`, t1.`COMMENT`, t1.`DATE`, DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%m月%d日 %H:%i') AS `DATE1`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`EXTRA`, t1.`ID`, 0 AS `ISACTORSS`, t1.`comment` AS `LASTCOMMENT`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then '1' end) AS `LASTMONTH`, (case when YEARWEEK(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK)) = YEARWEEK(t1.date) then '1' end) AS `LASTWEEK`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m') then '1' end) AS `THISMONTH`, (case when YEARWEEK(now()) = YEARWEEK(t1.date) then '1' end) AS `THISWEEK`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') then '1' end) AS `TODAY`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') then '1' end) AS `YESTERDAY` FROM `zt_action` t1

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, (case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end) AS `ACTIONMANNER`, t1.`ACTIONSN`, t1.`ACTOR`, t1.`COMMENT`, t1.`DATE`, DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%m月%d日 %H:%i') AS `DATE1`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`ID`, 0 AS `ISACTORSS`, t1.`comment` AS `LASTCOMMENT`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then '1' end) AS `LASTMONTH`, (case when YEARWEEK(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK)) = YEARWEEK(t1.date) then '1' end) AS `LASTWEEK`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m') then '1' end) AS `THISMONTH`, (case when YEARWEEK(now()) = YEARWEEK(t1.date) then '1' end) AS `THISWEEK`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') then '1' end) AS `TODAY`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') then '1' end) AS `YESTERDAY` FROM `zt_action` t1
AND ( t1.`OBJECTTYPE` = 'product' )

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`actor` as actor, t1.`DATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`OBJECTID`,(case when t1.`OBJECTTYPE` in ('daily','weekly','monthly') then CONCAT_WS('','ibz',t1.objectType) else t1.objectType end ) as OBJECTTYPE, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, t1.`comment`, t1.extra, case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end as ActionManner, t1.ACTIONSN FROM `zt_action` t1
AND t1.objecttype = 'product'

select t1.* from ( SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.actor as actor, t1.`DATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, t1.extra, case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end as ActionManner, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') then '1' end) as Today, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') then '1' end) as yesterday, (case when YEARWEEK(now()) = YEARWEEK(t1.date) then '1' end) as thisweek, (case when YEARWEEK(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK)) = YEARWEEK(t1.date) then '1' end) as lastweek, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m') then '1' end) as thismonth, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then '1' end) as lastmonth, t1.ACTIONSN, t1.SRFDCID FROM `zt_action` t1 where ( t1.`PRODUCT` LIKE CONCAT('%,',#{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey},',%') ) ) t1
AND (t1.Today = #{srf.n_today_eq} or t1.yesterday = #{srf.n_yesterday_eq} or t1.thisweek= #{srf.n_thisweek_eq} or t1.lastweek= #{srf.n_lastweek_eq} or t1.thismonth = #{srf.n_thismonth_eq} or t1.lastmonth= #{srf.n_lastmonth_eq} or (#{srf.n_today_eq} is null and #{srf.n_yesterday_eq} is null and #{srf.n_thisweek_eq} is null and #{srf.n_lastweek_eq} is null and #{srf.n_thismonth_eq} is null and #{srf.n_lastmonth_eq} is null ))
SELECT t1.`COMMENT`, t1.`DATE`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`ID`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME` FROM `zt_action` t1

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, t1.`actor` as actor, t1.`DATE`, t1.`ID`, t1.`OBJECTID`, (case when t1.`OBJECTTYPE` in ('daily','weekly','monthly') then CONCAT_WS('','ibz',t1.objectType) else t1.objectType end ) as OBJECTTYPE, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, t1.`comment`, t1.extra, (case when t1.actor = #{srf.sessioncontext.srfloginname} then 1 else 0 end) as ISACTORSS, case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end as ActionManner, t1.ACTIONSN FROM `zt_action` t1
AND t1.`OBJECTTYPE` = 'product'

SELECT t1.`ACTION`, (case when t1.objectType in ('bug','story','release') and t1.action in ('changestatus','resolved','closed', 'reviewed') and t1.extra <> '' then CONCAT_WS('_',t1.objectType,t1.action,t1.extra) else '' end) AS `ACTIONMANNER`, t1.`ACTIONSN`, t1.`ACTOR`, t1.`COMMENT`, t1.`DATE`, DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%m月%d日 %H:%i') AS `DATE1`, t1.`DEPT`, t1.`DEPTNAME`, t1.`EXTRA`, t1.`ID`, 0 AS `ISACTORSS`, t1.`comment` AS `LASTCOMMENT`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then '1' end) AS `LASTMONTH`, (case when YEARWEEK(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 WEEK)) = YEARWEEK(t1.date) then '1' end) AS `LASTWEEK`, t1.`OBJECTID`, t1.`OBJECTTYPE`, t1.`ORG`, t1.`ORGNAME`, t1.`PRODUCT`, t1.`PROJECT`, t1.`READ`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m') then '1' end) AS `THISMONTH`, (case when YEARWEEK(now()) = YEARWEEK(t1.date) then '1' end) AS `THISWEEK`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') then '1' end) AS `TODAY`, (case when DATE_FORMAT(t1.date,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d') then '1' end) AS `YESTERDAY` FROM `zt_action` t1
